Message:
Across the snowy mountain,
a single gunshot rings out.

Seein’ all the birds fly into
the air and flee at once,
a sense of dread
wells up inside me.

“No, it can’t be!”
Saying that to myself,
I sprint to the place
my sister and I were
supposed to meet.

My big sis was there,
her abdomen stained with blood.

Standing opposite was a woman
with eyes colder than ice,
holding a hunting rifle—

My head went blank.
Even so, I still desperately
push my body to move,
standing in front of
my sister to guard her.

My head went blank.
Even so, I still desperately
push my body to move,
standing in front of
my sister to guard her.

But, with calm eyes and
a cracking voice, my big sis began
pleading with her adversary
to at least spare my life!

Stop, don’t say such things!
If you’re gonna die,
then I will too!!

In place of the final words
my sister wished to impart,
only the bang of a gunshot
resounds in my ears.
